A4.text: Rivlin was elected as the 10th President of Israel on 10 June 2014, receiving the support of 63 MKs in a runoff vote against MK Meir Sheetrit.

A5.text: Isaac Herzog was elected to succeed Rivlin as president.

A6.text: President Reuven Rivlin wrote a foreword for the Rabin eBook.
